question: Can you recommend the nearest museum from Our Lady of the Rivers Shrine, Portage Des Sioux, MO?
sql:
SELECT * FROM pois
WHERE tourism = 'museum'
ORDER BY  geometry <-> ST_GeomFromText('POINT (-90.338654 38.931031)',4326)::geography ASC
LIMIT 1;

[2].display_name: Our Lady of the Rivers Shrine, Portage Des Sioux, MO

poi.poi_name: Our Lady of the Rivers Shrine
poi.description: Our Lady of the Rivers Shrine gets its name from the fact that three major rivers-the Illinois, Missouri, and the Mississippi-meet within a few miles of the site. Dedicated October 1957 to commemorate an event in July 1951.
